title: Heal
content:
Heal Level 6 Evocation Spell 70 Healing Heal a target's wounds and remove Blindness and any diseases. No effect on undead and constructs. Melee Action Level 6 Spell Slot

Level 6 Evocation Spell

Heal a target's wounds and remove Blindness and any diseases.

No effect on undead and constructs.

Heal is a Spell in Baldur's Gate 3. Heal is a Lvl 6 Spell from the Evocation school. Spells can be used for dealing damage to Enemies, inflict Status Ailments, buff Characters or interact with the environment.

Heal Information in BG3

Description: Heal a target's wounds and remove Blindness and any diseases. No effect on undead and constructs. Level: Lvl 6 spell School: Evocation School Casting Time: Action Range: Melee Requires Concentration: No Saving Throw:
